root.name: NFL 2K2
root.description: NFL 2K2 was the last in the NFL 2k series to be released for the Dreamcast. Following the demise of the Dreamcast, it was released on both the PlayStation 2 and Xbox consoles. 2K2 along with all other iterations in the series, featured 2 fictional commentators, Dan Stevens voiced by Terry McGovern and Peter O'Keefe voiced by Jay Styne . Wide Receiver Randy Moss was pictured on the cover, as it had been on both of the previous covers.

similar_games.game: NFL Sports Talk Football '93 Starring Joe Montana
